Uses of Class
org.opentrafficsim.core.unit.AccelerationUnit

  • Packages that use AccelerationUnit 
    Package Description
    org.opentrafficsim.car
    Classes that extend the GTU to car behavior.
    org.opentrafficsim.car.following
    Car following models such as IDM+.
    org.opentrafficsim.car.lanechanging
    Classes that deal with lane changing models.
    org.opentrafficsim.core.unit
    Classes for the unit system.
    org.opentrafficsim.core.value.conversions
    Common conversions that generate results in the correct unit.

      Longitudinal deceleration [m/s^2].
      protected DoubleScalar.Abs<AccelerationUnit> IDMPlus.b0
